channel.title: Add custom user attributes (claims) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add custom user attributes (claims) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 328 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Claims are user attributes that are returned in tokens. This is the R part of CRUD in “Manage user accounts” Links to original docs: Customize tokens returned from Okta with custom claims: https://developer.
